Texts.Chs: 最后，选择^orange;玄学^reset;。在那里，你只需要选择一个主题，你就能开始研究，只要你有所需的物品，就能完成手头的研究！
Texts.Eng: Finally, select ^orange;Metaphysics^reset;. From there, you need only select a topic, and you will be able to begin research into that topic if you have the required goods to accomplish the task at hand!

Texts.Chs: 首先，找到自己的^orange;S.A.I.L^reset;电脑系统！一旦找到了，点击界面上的^orange;杂项^reset;按钮。很简单，对吧？然后你只需要找到选项 ^green;[FU] RESEARCH TREES^reset;然后按下按它。
Texts.Eng: First, find yourself a ^orange;S.A.I.L^reset; computer system! Once you have one, tap the ^orange;MISC^reset; button on the interface. Easy, right? Then you need only find the option that says ^green;[FU] RESEARCH TREES^reset; and press it.

Texts.Chs: 如何研究科学的新领域。
Texts.Eng: How to research new realms of science.

Note that you can forgo all of the previous steps if you simply craft yourself a handy ^orange;Tricorder^resset; at a Nanofabricator or Tinker Table (assuming you don't already have one)! Just select the ^orange;BEAKER^reset; icon on its interface.

Texts.Chs:
你已经收到了这期的《玄学月刊》杂志！祝贺你！为了充分的遨游在这个令人兴奋的科学研究领域，你需要做一些事情。

首先，找到自己的^orange;S.A.I.L^reset;电脑系统！一旦找到了，点击界面上的^orange;杂项^reset;按钮。很简单，对吧？然后你只需要找到选项 ^green;[FU] RESEARCH TREES^reset;然后按下按它。

最后，选择^orange;Metaphysics^reset;。在那里，你只需要选择一个主题，你就能开始研究，只要你有所需的物品，就能完成手头的研究！

请注意，如果你已经简单地在纳米加工器或改造台处自己制作一个手持^orange;三度仪^reset;(如果你还没有的话),那么您可以放弃前面所有的步骤！之后只要选择三度仪界面里的^orange;烧杯^reset;图标。
Texts.Eng:
You've received this issue of Metaphysics Monthly! Congratulations!

To make the absolute most out of this exciting area of scientific research you'll need to do a few things:

First, find yourself a ^orange;S.A.I.L^reset; computer system! Once you have one, tap the ^orange;MISC^reset; button on the interface. Easy, right? Then you need only find the option that says ^green;[FU] RESEARCH TREES^reset; and press it.

Finally, select ^orange;Metaphysics^reset;. From there, you need only select a topic, and you will be able to begin research into that topic if you have the required goods to accomplish the task at hand!

Note that you can forgo all of the previous steps if you simply craft yourself a handy ^orange;Tricorder^reset; at a ^green;Nanofabricator or Tinker Table^reset; (assuming you don't already have one)! Just select the ^orange;BEAKER^reset; icon on its interface.

Texts.Chs: 你已经收到了这期的《玄学月刊》杂志！祝贺你！为了充分的遨游在这个令人兴奋的科学研究领域，你需要做一些事情。
Texts.Eng: You've received this issue of Metaphysics Monthly! Congratulations! To make the absolute most out of this exciting area of scientific research you'll need to do a few things.
